channel.title: Twitch on Wimpy's World
channel.description: Recent content in Twitch on Wimpy's World

item.title: Live
item.description: My Twitch and YouTube channels are a celebration of Desktop Linux 🐧 and include live coding on various projects such as Debian, Ubuntu, MATE Desktop 🧉, Nix ❄ and making Raspberry Pi devices. I’m an OBS Studio nerd 🤓 and love to tinker with effects and interactive features.
